title: Extends the effectiveness of a provision pertaining to grants to school districts and other public educational entities
summary: Extends the effectiveness of a provision pertaining to grants to school districts and other public educational entities.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         8522

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   December 17, 2010
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  OPPENHEIMER -- read twice and ordered printed, and
         when printed to be committed to the Committee on Rules

       AN ACT to amend chapter 57 of the laws of 2004, amending the  labor  law
         and other laws relating to implementation of the state fiscal plan for
         the  2004-2005  state  fiscal  year,  in relation to extending certain
         provisions of such chapter

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 11 of section 94 of part C of chapter 57 of the
    2  laws  of  2004, amending the labor law and other laws relating to imple-
    3  mentation of the state fiscal plan for the 2004-2005 state fiscal  year,
    4  as amended by section 55 of part A of chapter 57 of the laws of 2009, is
    5  amended to read as follows:
    6    11.  section  seventy-one  of  this  act  shall  expire  and be deemed
    7  repealed June 30, [2010] 2011;
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately and  shall  be  deemed  to
    9  have been in full force and effect on and after June 30, 2010.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD18301-01-0
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 57 of the laws of 2004, amending the labor law and other laws relating to implementation of the state fiscal plan for the 2004-2005 state fiscal year, in relation to extending certain provisions of such chapter
